title: Toll House Heritage Cookbook: A Collection of Favorite Dessert Recipes
description: "In our heritage cookbook you'll find old-fashioned favorites you've often asked for as well as some new temptations. The versatility of chocolate is deliciously demonstrated, for example, by our breakfast breads- plus the many surprising new ways that we've discovered to display this rich and delectable ingredient. "
author: Nestle Toll House
